Introducing the perfect addition to your garden's wildlife sanctuary â€“ our handcrafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Made with durability and style in mind, this cozy abode promises not only to be a safe haven for your furry friends but also to add a touch of rustic charm to your outdoor space. 

**Craftsmanship Meets Nature**
Constructed from the finest cedar wood, known for its natural resistance to weather and decay, this nesting box is both glued and nailed, ensuring a sturdy and lasting shelter for your neighborhood squirrels. The craftsmanship is impeccable, designed to withstand the elements and provide a welcoming environment for your bushy-tailed visitors.

**Artistic Flair**
Each box features a unique, artistically burned image of a squirrel, created by the talented Drew Senesac, making it not just a house, but a piece of art that celebrates the beauty of wildlife. This enchanting design will surely catch the eye of both guests and the squirrels you're looking to attract.

**Convenience is Key**
The thoughtful design includes a removable roof, making cleaning a breeze and ensuring that your little guests have a hygienic space to call home. Installation is a snap with pre-drilled holes, and we've included two screws and washers for immediate, hassle-free mounting. 

**Perfectly Sized for Your Furry Friends**
With outside dimensions measuring 12x11x10 inches, it provides ample space without being obtrusive in your garden. The inside is a cozy 5.75x9 inches, and the squirrel opening is an ideal 3.5 inches in diameter, perfect for squirrels to come and go with ease.

**Why Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box?**
- Crafted from resilient cedar wood
- Features an artistically burned squirrel image
- Removable roof for easy cleaning
- Includes all necessary mounting hardware
- Designed and built to last in outdoor conditions

Introducing the "Squirrel Haven" - a charming and durable cedar wood nesting box that will turn your garden into a cozy retreat for your furry backyard friends! Expertly crafted to withstand the great outdoors, our Squirrel House/Nesting Box combines functionality with artistic flair, featuring a unique burned image of a playful squirrel, handcrafted by the talented artist Drew Senesac.

**Attractive and Sturdy Cedar Construction**
Built to last, the Squirrel Haven is made from high-quality cedar wood known for its natural resistance to weather and decay. Each box is carefully glued and nailed, ensuring a secure shelter for squirrels year-round.

**Thoughtful and Convenient Design**
Not only is our Squirrel House aesthetically pleasing, but it's also designed with both the homeowner and the squirrelâ€™s needs in mind. The removable roof provides easy access for cleaning, while the pre-drilled holes, along with the included screws and washers, make for a hassle-free mounting experience. 

**Perfectly Sized for Your Bushy-Tailed Guests**
With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches and a cozy interior of 5.75x9 inches, it offers ample space for squirrels to nest and rest. The 3.5-inch squirrel opening is perfectly sized to welcome its intended guests while keeping out larger intruders.

**Artistic Touch for Your Garden**
The Squirrel Haven is not just a nesting box; it's a piece of art. The front panel boasts a beautifully burned image of a squirrel, adding a touch of whimsy to your outdoor space.

**Specifications:**
- Material: Cedar Wood
- Suitable for Outdoor Use
- Glued and Nailed for Extra Durability
- Removable Roof for Easy Cleaning
- Burned Image of Squirrel by Drew Senesac
- Mounting Hardware Included (2 Screws and 2 Washers)
- Outside Dimensions: 12x11x10 inches
- Inside Dimensions: 5.75x9 inches
- Squirrel Opening: 3.5 inches

Invite nature to your doorstep and give a warm welcome to the playful squirrels in your backyard with the Squirrel Haven nesting box. It's not just a nesting box; it's a sanctuary for squirrels and a delightful addition to your garden decor. Order yours today and enjoy the lively presence of squirrels in your own backyard sanctuary!

Bring the charm of wildlife right into your backyard with our beautifully crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Designed with both style and function in mind, this cozy abode offers local squirrels a safe and inviting place to call home.

Crafted with the highest quality cedar wood, renowned for its natural resistance to the elements and durability, this nesting box is perfect for outdoor use. The robust construction features both glued and nailed joints, ensuring a sturdy and long-lasting haven for your furry friends.

But it's not just about practicality; this nesting box is a work of art. Adorning one of its walls is a stunning, burned image of a squirrel, masterfully created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This unique touch not only adds to the aesthetic appeal of the box but also celebrates the creature it's designed to protect.

The thoughtfully designed squirrel house measures 12x11x10 inches on the outside, providing ample space, while the inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches offer a cozy and secure nesting area. The 3.5-inch squirrel opening is perfectly sized to welcome squirrels yet deter larger, unwelcome guests.

Maintenance is a breeze with the removable roof, allowing for easy cleaning and ensuring the health and happiness of its inhabitants. Plus, installation couldn't be simpler, thanks to the included mounting hardwareâ€”two screws and washersâ€”and pre-drilled holes. In no time at all, you can have the nesting box securely attached to a tree or post in your backyard.

Invite nature to your doorstep and give a squirrel a place to thrive. Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box isn't just a purchase; it's an investment in the natural world, a touch of rustic charm for your garden, and a delightful spectacle as you watch squirrels frolic and play in their new home.

Order now and become a steward of wildlife while adding a picturesque piece to your outdoor space!

Introducing our charming Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box â€“ the perfect addition to your outdoor sanctuary that provides a cozy and safe haven for your neighborhood squirrels!

Crafted with durability in mind, this nesting box is constructed from premium cedar wood, a material renowned for its natural resistance to the elements and its delightful aromatic scent. Both glued and nailed to ensure a sturdy and long-lasting home for your furry friends, this squirrel house is built to withstand the tests of time and weather.

One of the most enchanting features of this nesting box is the exquisite burned image of a squirrel, meticulously created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This rustic artwork adds a whimsical touch to your garden or backyard, turning the nesting box into not only a functional habitat but also a piece of outdoor art.

Ease of maintenance is at the forefront of the design. The roof of the squirrel house is conveniently removable, making cleaning a breeze and ensuring a healthy environment for its occupants. Hanging and mounting this box is simple, too, with two pre-drilled holes, screws, and washers included, allowing for a secure and stable installation on a tree, fence, or wall.

The outside dimensions of the box are 12x11x10 inches, providing ample space for squirrels to nest and rest. Inside, the dimensions are a snug 5.75x9 inches, creating a cozy retreat. The 3.5-inch squirrel opening is perfectly sized to welcome squirrels while keeping larger predators out.

Whether you're an animal lover, a nature enthusiast, or simply looking to add charm to your outdoor space, our Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box is the ideal choice. Give the squirrels in your area a home they'll love, and enjoy the added benefit of watching these playful creatures in your own backyard.

Order now and be a part of fostering wildlife, one nesting box at a time!
